DPRK athletes prove successful in Asian championships
articles.content:
DPRK athletes prove successful in Asian championships 
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- Ham Pong Sil of the DPRK came first in the women's 10,000m long distance running in the 14th Asian track and field championships in Colombo on August 10.
 Jo Pun Hui was the runner-up in the same event.

articles.content:
North side's delegation to 7th inter-Korean ministerial talks leaves
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) -- The north side's delegation led by Kim Ryong Song, chief councillor of the cabinet of the DPRK, left here today to attend the 7th north-south ministerial talks to be held in Seoul.
 It was seen off at the airport by Kang Nung Su, minister of culture, An Kyong Ho, director of the secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Greetings to Fidel Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Greetings to Fidel Castro Ruz
    Pyongyang, August 12 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on August 5 sent a message of greetings to Fidel Castro Ruz, first secretary of the central committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, President of the council of state and President of the council of ministers, on the occasion of his 76th birthday.
 The message says: 
 We highly praise the communist party, the government and people of Cuba for firmly defending the gains of revolution and achieving the people's genuine happiness and prosperity of the country while bravely meeting all challenges of the imperialists and the counter-revolutionary forces under your wise guidance.    
 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we wish you bigger success in your noble work for the victory of socialism and the welfare of your people as well as your good health and happiness, in the firm belief that the firm comradely friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties, governments and peoples forged in the joint struggle for independence against imperialism and for socialism will continue to grow stronger.
